name: OpenIndex Retrieval Plugin API MCP Server

### ‚öôÔ∏è Setup Instructions

1. **Import Workflow**:

2. **Authentication**: 
No authentication required

3. **Activate Workflow**:
Enable the workflow to start the MCP server

4. **Get MCP URL**: 
Copy the webhook URL from the MCP trigger

5. **Connect AI Agent**:
Use the MCP URL in your AI agent configuration

## üõ†Ô∏è OpenIndex Retrieval Plugin MCP Server ‚úÖ 1 operation

### About
A retrieval API for querying and filtering documents based on natural language queries and metadata

### üîß How it Works

This workflow converts the OpenIndex Retrieval Plugin API into an MCP-compatible interface for AI agents.

‚Ä¢ **MCP Trigger**: Serves as your server endpoint for AI agent requests
‚Ä¢ **HTTP Request Nodes**: Handle API calls to https://retriever.openindex.ai/sub
‚Ä¢ **AI Expressions**: Automatically populate parameters via `$fromAI()` placeholders
‚Ä¢ **Native Integration**: Returns responses directly to the AI agent
